body_html: Well, i tested it in Python3, and surprisingly there was no segfault, but using cuda functions told me that torch doesn't see my nvidia driver. Looks like my driver was somehow corrupted without visible symptoms (nvidia-smi and nvidia x-server settings worked fine). Reinstalling the driver solved my problem.

body: Well, i tested it in Python3, and surprisingly there was no segfault, but using cuda functions told me that torch doesn't see my nvidia driver. Looks like my driver was somehow corrupted without visible symptoms (nvidia-smi and nvidia x-server settings worked fine). Reinstalling the driver solved my problem.
